tidbits.title: Natural Riches
tidbits.description: Guinea is blessed with natural riches, including vast mineral resources like bauxite, making it one of the world's top producers of the ore.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country features diverse landscapes, from savannas and lush forests to the Fouta Djallon highlands, providing scenic beauty and biodiversity.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Guinea has a rich cultural heritage, celebrated through traditional music, dance, and festivals like the Soumba and the Baga Nimba masks.
